results.name: Alternating sum of all divisors of n; divisors nondecreasing, starting with 1.
comment: a(n)>0 iff n square (iff A000005(n) is even), a(A000290(n))>0;
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
